explains: n. 记录者；年代史编者

sentences.en: Chris Cviic, chronicler of eastern Europe, died on December 11th, aged 80.
sentences.cn: 东欧编年史家chris Cviic于12月11日逝世，享年80岁。

sentences.en: In Touch apparently has become the Official Chronicler of American Bedding.
sentences.cn: 《每周接触》似乎已成为美国床上用品的编年史。

sentences.en: As a chronicler of natural history today, Frans Lanting is a singular extraordinary talent.
sentences.cn: 作为当下的一名自然历史记录者，Frans Lanting是一个独一无二的非凡的天才。
